strapiPost.title: Primary Elections One Month Away
strapiPost.content:
It’s one month out from the primary elections, and today is the last day for new voters to register to participate.

  • Participate: The University of Arkansas Division of Agriculture Research and Extensions has all the resources you’ll need to be an educated voter. Registering to vote is the first step in taking part in local, state, and federal elections in Arkansas. 
  • Next steps: Ballots are always accessible to view before voting day so you can become acquainted with what you will be voting for. Make sure to take a look at your voting locations and times as well!

For all the resources you need, click HERE.
